name: Doing It The RetroWave
description:
[Warning] Game is still in very-early access! [Warning]

Made for the Improve My Game Jam 26, originally meant to be a simple arcade neon-style racer. I decided to improve and expand on the idea. Currently there's one race track available and you can play in 2-player mode to see who's objectively the best driver in the Retrowave world!

Planned features:

-Amazing retro-wave style nostalgic music

-Amazing'er special effects

-Car Selection

-Track selection

-Racing with AI enemies

-More interesting views

-Much needed optimization (It might make your GPU go brrrr)

As per usual, everything so far is made by Me. You're more than welcome to follow my progress as I ironically plan to improve it after the Improve My Game Jam. I'll try to post new versions of the game as soon as I can.

Feedback is much appreciated, altough I am already aware of many issues and updates are coming soon.
